FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 3 / Characters /

Banzaitron, Devious Orchestrator

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Is Banzaitron a Leader if I have an Autobot head on a Decepticon body?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    No.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Is Banzaitron a Leader if I have him, a Decepticon, and a Mercenary on my starting team?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    Yes.
  3. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does Banzaitron’s flip-to-Alt ability work with     Hunker Down? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 3 FAQ]
    If you put an Armor on him with Hunker Down, and it doesn’t scrap before you have resolved his flip-to-Alt ability, you will get to do the effect because the “if Armor” clause isn’t until after the arrow.
